description: Test operator precedence (AND has higher precedence than OR)

queries.input: prof is John or prof is Jane and subject is CS
queries.description: Should be parsed as: prof is John OR (prof is Jane AND subject is CS)

queries.input: subject is MATH and prof is Smith or title contains calculus
queries.description: Should be parsed as: (subject is MATH AND prof is Smith) OR title contains calculus

queries.input: ((prof is John and subject is CS) or (prof is Jane and subject is MATH))
(prof is John and (subject is CS or subject is MATH)) and credit hours > 3

description: Test IS NOT condition in various contexts

queries.input: prof is not John and subject is CS
queries.description: IS NOT condition combined with AND

queries.input: prof is John and subject is not CS
prof is not John and subject is not CS
prof is not John or prof is not Jane

description: Test error cases with malformed parentheses
Test long chains of logical operators

queries.input: prof is A and prof is B and prof is C and prof is D
prof is A or prof is B or prof is C or prof is D
prof is A and prof is B or prof is C and prof is D
